data.actual_result: Every new search you make this way will add an extra space between the filter and the content. In this example, the first time it will be `in:#channel mycontent`, the second time `in:#channel  mycontent`, the third time `in:#channel    mycontent`, and so on.
data.expected_result: The exact same search should be done each time you repeat step 3-5
data.short_description: If you tap on a search history entry with a filter followed by a content, a space will be added between the filter and the content
data.steps_to_repro: - In any server, tap Search - Input any filter followed by a content (e.g `in:#channel mycontent`) - After submitting search, go back and close Search - Open Search again. An entry should've been created in the search history. - Tap on it - Repeat from step 3 through step 5 as many times as you want
